name: Uno
description: Classic card game with rooms, spectators, and customizable house rules. Match colors and numbers to be the first to empty your hand!
author: Framework Team

rules.objective: Be the first player to get rid of all your cards
specialCards: Skip - Next player loses their turn
Reverse - Reverses the direction of play
Draw Two - Next player draws 2 cards and loses their turn
Wild - Choose any color to continue play
Wild Draw Four - Choose color and next player draws 4 cards
